content.3: And Jacob said unto Joseph, God Almighty appeared unto me at Luz in the land of Canaan, and blessed me,
content.4: And said unto me, Behold, I will make thee fruitful, and multiply thee, and I will make of thee a multitude of people; and will give this land to thy seed after thee
content.5: And now thy two sons, Ephraim and Manasseh, which were born unto thee in the land of Egypt before I came unto thee into Egypt,
content.6: And thy issue, which thou begettest after them, shall be thine,
content.7: And as for me, when I came from Padan, Rachel died by me in the land of Canaan in the way, when yet
content.8: And Israel beheld Joseph’s sons, and said, Who
content.9: And Joseph said unto his father, They
content.10: Now the eyes of Israel were dim for age,
content.11: And Israel said unto Joseph, I had not thought to see thy face: and, lo, God hath shewed me also thy seed.
content.12: And Joseph brought them out from between his knees, and he bowed himself with his face to the earth.
content.13: And Joseph took them both, Ephraim in his right hand toward Israel’s left hand, and Manasseh in his left hand toward Israel’s right hand, and brought
content.14: And Israel stretched out his right hand, and laid
content.15: And he blessed Joseph, and said, God, before whom my fathers Abraham and Isaac did walk, the God which fed me all my life long unto this day,
content.16: The Angel which redeemed me from all evil, bless the lads; and let my name be named on them, and the name of my fathers Abraham and Isaac; and let them grow into a multitude in the midst of the earth.
content.17: And when Joseph saw that his father laid his right hand upon the head of Ephraim, it displeased him: and he held up his father’s hand, to remove it from Ephraim’s head unto Manasseh’s head.
content.18: And Joseph said unto his father, Not so, my father: for this
content.19: And his father refused, and said, I know
content.20: And he blessed them that day, saying, In thee shall Israel bless, saying, God make thee as Ephraim and as Manasseh: and he set Ephraim before Manasseh.
content.21: And Israel said unto Joseph, Behold, I die: but God shall be with you, and bring you again unto the land of your fathers.
content.22: Moreover I have given to thee one portion above thy brethren, which I took out of the hand of the Amorite with my sword and with my bow.
